titleStmt.title: A lytle treatise of the maner and forme of confession, made by the most excellent and famous clerke, M. Eras. of Roterdame
Exomologesis. English
titleStmt.author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Flete strete by Ioh[a]n Byddell, at the signe of our lady of Pitie, nexte to Flete bridge, for wyllyam Marshall],

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
Title page has border (McKerrow and Ferguson 29) with Byddell's name in type in the sill.
At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio regali.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of our lady of Pitie, nexte to Flete bridge
